about_the_game:
Forget the traditional MMORPG magic system. In Magic World, magic is not just about pressing buttons. Here, you must master the art of spellcasting by drawing magical symbols with your mouse and combining them with key presses to unleash devastating abilities. Every spell is a test of skill, knowledge, and precision.

Key Features:

  • Gesture-Based Magic System – Draw intricate symbols and combine them with key inputs to cast powerful spells and unlock unique combos.

  • Skill-Based Combat – No auto-attacks or predictable rotations. Every spell must be executed correctly, or it will result in a weak lightning strike instead of a powerful cast.

  • Expansive Open World – Explore mysterious lands, ancient ruins, hidden treasures, and battle dangerous creatures.

  • Deep Character Progression – Learn new spells, refine your casting technique, and shape your mage to fit your playstyle.

  • PvP and PvE Challenges – Face powerful creatures in PvE or test your skill against other players in intense duels where only the most skilled sorcerers will prevail.

  • A Rich Storyline and Side Quests – Unravel the secrets of the magical world through an immersive main story and rewarding side quests.

In Magic World, your fate is determined not by your character’s power, but by your skill. Will you rise as a legendary mage, or will your spells fade into nothingness?

Enter a world where magic is an art, and only those who master it will survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 / Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB / Intel Arc A750
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 / Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700 / AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070 Ti / Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 / AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • Storage: 24 MB available space

short_description: Master magic with a unique gesture system! In Magic World, you wield a magic wand and combine mouse movements with key presses to cast powerful spells. Simple spells for beginners, complex ones for true masters! Are you ready to become the strongest mage?
